participant_1.name: Rachel
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys expressing herself through writing and cooking.
participant_1.background: I enjoy rock music when I'm cooking dinner or driving my Mustang. I ride horses. My ultimate dream, however, is to be a writer. I have a baby monitor that I use to watch my baby while I play video games. I like to pamper myself.

participant_2.name: Megan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and adventurous, she seeks joy in hobbies that allow her to explore her creativity.
participant_2.background: I enjoy strong female characters in my movies. I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax. I am average height, but my family is very tall. I play Dungeons and Dragons. I do not have a college degree.

content.text: Good thanks, I'm writing a book about strong female characters in movies. Do you have any favorite movies with strong female characters?
I love strong female characters! I really enjoyed Wonder Woman in the new movie.
Me too! She's such a badass. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play Dungeons and Dragons, I also like to ride horses.
Horses are awesome! I used to ride them when I was younger. Do you have a favorite kind of horse?
I love Arabians! They're so beautiful and graceful.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to pamper myself, I get massages and facials a lot. I also enjoy cooking and playing video games.
I love cooking too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is so good! I love making it too.
